seccommerce.secsignersigg
Interface SmartCardInsertionCertListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
SecSignerAppletCertCheck
public interface SmartCardInsertionCertListener

This listener will get the certificates from a newly inserted card.

Version:
$Id: SmartCardInsertionCertListener.java,v 1.1 2005/08/17 10:30:24 tk Exp $
Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg

Method Summary
 void smartCardInsertedCert(byte[] sigCert, byte[] authCert, byte[] decryptCert)
          This method is called by SecSignerMgrAbstract right after a smart card has been inserted and its certificates have been read.
 

Method Detail

smartCardInsertedCert

void smartCardInsertedCert(byte[] sigCert,
                           byte[] authCert,
                           byte[] decryptCert)
                           throws java.beans.PropertyVetoException
This method is called by SecSignerMgrAbstract right after a smart card has been inserted and its certificates have been read.

Parameters:
sigCert - signature certificate
authCert - authentification certificate
decryptCert - decrypt certificate (optional)
Throws:
java.beans.PropertyVetoException
